input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 12" Canadian Pine 2-Tone Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 15 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Rockefeller Pine Traditional 15 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Dunhill Fir Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='NOMA Frosted Fir 9 Foot Pre Lit Christmas Garland Holiday Decor'
  - Name='Norfolk Pine Garland'
  - Name='Kurt Adler 9' Pre-Lit Incandescent Grand Fir Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Green Scotch Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 300 Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9' Christmas Trimmed Snowy Twig Garland with 200 Warm White LED Rice Lights and'
  - Name='Flocked Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Northern Pine Commercial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Glittery Bristle Pine Garland with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9' Pre-Lit Cedar Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Decorated Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 12" Canadian Pine 2-Tone Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar garland concept with artificial pine, same length, but different fir type (Canadian Pine) and possibly different lighting or decoration details not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 15 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree rather than garland, much longer and different product type, low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Rockefeller Pine Traditional 15 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree product, not garland, different use and shape, so poor relevancy despite similar holiday theme.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree product, differing fundamentally in form and function from garland, low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same reasoning as above; a narrow tree product differs considerably from a garland in application and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Dunhill Fir Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length, fir type, and includes lighting, making it relevant, but not from same brand and lighting color may differ, slightly less relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: NOMA Frosted Fir 9 Foot Pre Lit Christmas Garland Holiday Decor
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length, pre-lit garland with fir branches, but frosted appearance may indicate different styling and no pine cones mentioned.
Garland product but different pine type (Norfolk Pine), no length or lighting info, likely less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler 9' Pre-Lit Incandescent Grand Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length, pre-lit garland with fir branches, similar function but uses incandescent bulbs, different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Green Scotch Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 300 Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree product, shorter, different item type, so low relevancy despite shared holiday usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9' Christmas Trimmed Snowy Twig Garland with 200 Warm White LED Rice Lights and
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland product with lighting from same brand and correct length, but twig base and snowy trimmed differs from Carolina Pine garland features.
General pine garland, flocked style differs from reference product, no length or lighting details, moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Northern Pine Commercial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland likely similar function, but different brand and possibly commercial grade, details on lights or length missing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Glittery Bristle Pine Garland with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, length, and lighting color; glittery bristle pine variation slightly different styling but generally similar construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9' Pre-Lit Cedar Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit feature from same brand, but cedar is different from pine, so moderately less relevant.
Same brand and garland category but vague description with no details on lighting, size, or materials leading to average relevance.
